mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO planocycle.work_priority_all_restrict( priority_all_cd, company_cd, author_cd, shelf_pattern_cd, restrict_cd, zokusei1, zokusei2, zokusei3, zokusei4, zokusei5, zokusei6, zokusei7, zokusei8, zokusei9, zokusei10, tana_cnt, sku_cnt) VALUES
(#{list.priorityAllCd, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.authorCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.patternCd, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.restrictCd, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.zokusei1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.zokusei10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.tanaCnt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.skuCnt, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into planocycle.work_all_pattern_restrict_result(shelf_pattern_cd,company_cd,author_cd,restrict_cd,sku_cnt,zokusei1 ,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,zokusei11,zokusei12, zokusei13,zokusei14,zokusei15,zokusei16,zokusei17,zokusei18,zokusei19, zokusei20,zokusei21,zokusei22,zokusei23,zokusei24,zokusei25,zokusei26, zokusei27,zokusei28,zokusei29,zokusei30,zokusei31,zokusei32,zokusei33, priority_all_cd) select #{shelfPatternCd},#{companyCd},#{authorCd},restrict_cd,sku_cnt,zokusei1 ,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,zokusei11,zokusei12, zokusei13,zokusei14,zokusei15,zokusei16,zokusei17,zokusei18,zokusei19, zokusei20,zokusei21,zokusei22,zokusei23,zokusei24,zokusei25,zokusei26, zokusei27,zokusei28,zokusei29,zokusei30,zokusei31,zokusei32,zokusei33,#{priorityAllCd}
from planocycle.basic_pattern_restrict_result result where priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd}
mapper.delete: delete from planocycle.work_all_pattern_restrict_result where priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd}
